column4: Hi, everyone. I want to dual boot my laptop, ubuntu and windows xp. I've read pages about how to do it. Now I just need one clarification, while it's recommended to install windows first, and should I first partion my hd for windows xp first, say 10G out of 90G?
make a win party beforehand, say least 10 G ntfs, install xp, install ubu
no, do so, ask if problems
